executable.title: FindPatchMatch
executable.description: Perform an exhaustive search through an image and identify the \ coordinates that correspond to an exact match with the input image. I, J, K Coordinates of exact \ match correspond to the position of the patch's origin and are written to the command line.
executable.contributor: Applied Chest Imaging Laboratory, Brigham and Women's Hospital
executable.acknowledgements: This work is funded by the National Heart, Lung, And Blood Institute of the National \ Institutes of Health under Award Number R01HL116931. The content is solely the responsibility of the authors \ and does not necessarily represent the official views of the National Institutes of Health.

image.name: ctFileName
image.label: CT file name
image.description: Input CT file. The program will slide the patch over \ this image and look for coordinates that correspond to exact overlap.

image.name: patchFileName
image.label: Patch file name
image.description: Input patch file. The program will slide this patch over \ the image and look for coordinates that correspond to exact overlap.
